p.k: Jean Jacket The Bears find a bedazzled jean jacket in a dumpster. It's just about the coolest thing they've ever seen and seems to make the wearer of the jacket extremely lucky. But after the Bears fight over who gets control of the jacket, they have to consider that...
p.d: Grizzly, Panda and Ice Bear are three brothers awkwardly trying to fit in the human world and make friends which can be kind of hard to do when you are a bear. Whether they are looking for food, trying to make human friends or scheming to become Internet famous, it's obvious that being a bear in a civilised modern world is tough, but at least they have each other.
